DOC.brief_summary: Investigators plan prospective cohort study adaptive design base physical function status . The design involve track number woman recruit physical function impairment without functional impairment . Investigators aim recruit similar number woman group . If investigator find unequal number , adapt recruit strategy base woman 's functional status .
DOC.detailed_description: Investigators plan prospective cohort study adaptive design base physical function status . The design involve track number woman recruit physical function impairment without functional impairment . Investigators aim recruit similar number woman group . If find unequal number , adapt recruit strategy base woman 's functional status . Investigators compare change outcome measure within group 6 12 week pelvic floor muscle exercise ( PFME ) . The change pelvic floor strength/efficiency assess repeat pelvic floor PERFECT assessment compare group . Changes UI symptom , symptom severity , impact UI symptom quality life determine use standardized measure describe . Data analysis define association change PERFECT measure change UI episode ( base 3-day void diary ) , severity , type ( base QUID-7 ) , impact quality life ( PFIQ-7 ) within group . Objective measurement lower-extremity strength inform relationship lower-extremity strength , pelvic floor strength , UI symptoms baseline 6-week visit .
DOC.criteria: Women , age 70 year old Diagnosis Urinary Incontinence ( define QUID assessment subscale score stress ≥4 , and/or urge score ≥ 6 ) Willing able compliant pelvic floor muscle exercise intervention ( standard care ) 12 week log compliance Willing able undergo extensive physical function evaluation Prior surgical intervention urinary incontinence within past 12 month Hysterectomy within 12 month Diagnosis : Pelvic Organ Prolapse beyond hymenal ring Urogenital Fistula Neurogenic Overactive Bladder ( associate diagnosis Multiple Sclerosis Stroke within past 12 month ) Incomplete Bladder Emptying/Urinary Retention PVR > 150 ml ( measure bladder scan ) Requires assisted device ( 4 point cane , walker ) ambulation /most time wheelchair bound Having significant cognitive impairment dementia Unsafe exercise ( severe cardiopulmonary disease ) Unable/unwilling provide inform consent Determined otherwise ineligible principal investigator
